activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6745
activity.text:
> > Just clarifying the wording, you will be adding the filter in the patients viewset right? And not an additional field in the patient/consultation model right?
> 
> Actually what I was trying to do was finding a way to add a filter for review missed in the same way as the "Review Missed" chip is shown on a patient's card.

What about this ?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6745
activity.text: Also currently, there is no patient having the review missed chip, is there was any, it would be easier for me to check the filter once it's made.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6745
activity.text:
> Just clarifying the wording, you will be adding the filter in the patients viewset right? And not an additional field in the patient/consultation model right?

Actually what I was trying to do was finding a way to add a filter for review missed in the same way as the "Review Missed" chip is shown on a patient's card.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6745
activity.text: There are filelds like review_interval and review_time in the PatientModel, so if I create a review_done field in the PatientModel, then according to you, how can I handle the filters with the help of it ?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6926
activity.text: Production Release: December Week 4

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6745
activity.text: Like other fields as gender, age, telemedicine, etc.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6745
activity.text: So my idea was to create a "is_review_missed" field in the patient object, and assigning th values to it using the same criteria, and then adding the filter based on this particular field.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6745
activity.text: Hello @rithviknishad , in the code block of showing the chip of "Review Missed", the chip has been conditionally rendered using some criteria and properties of the patient object from the "patientList" in ManagePatients.tsx

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6745
activity.text: OK!

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6745
activity.text: Hey @rithviknishad, when we click the "Advanced Filters" button on the "Patients" page, we have 4 categories in the SlideOver - Patient Details based, Date based, Geography based and COVID Details based. So I wanted to ask under which category should I put the "Review Missed" filter option?
